Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Detroit in 1970...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/28/1970, off Don Sutton (OAK)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1970, hitting .301 with 15 HR, 77 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (A) on 7/18/1972...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1973, hitting .324 with 9 HR, 22 RBI...
Injured on 6/10/1975 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1975, hitting .423 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against Oakland on 4/27/1976...
Drove in 8 runs against Oakland on 6/14/1976...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won MVP Award in 1976, hitting .301 with 27 HR, 104 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Oakland on 7/31/1977...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1979, hitting .625 with 2 HR, 3 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1979, hitting .400 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/17/1979 with a Broken Knee, out for full season...
Injured on 4/28/1981 with a Ruptured Medial Collateral Ligament, out for 9 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1981, hitting .529 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Chicago (A) on 9/7/1981...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1982, hitting .400 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 2000th career hit on 5/29/1983, off Jim Minshall (MIN)...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/7/1984 to a 2-year deal worth $7,500,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1984, hitting .462 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
